ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Make it so that you must be sitting to do it   Make it like meditate. if u get atacked the screen goes away and u stand up. It just drives me nuts when i get
ygData.messageBody:
Make it so that you must be sitting to do it Make it like meditate. if u
get atacked the screen goes away and u stand up. It just drives me nuts when
i get ICQ mesages while playing and cant check em!

Trevalien
Air Plane...Air Plane...Air Plane...


>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
>Date: Mon, 23 Aug 1999 14:11:56 -0500
>
>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
>Oh god no. That would provide yet another distraction for people. I can
>think of several instances where I have gotten killed because someone is
>chatting away on /guildsay. Just think how bad it would be if someone was
>having a /tell conversation, /guildsay, and ICQ going at the same time.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Trevalien Manix [SMTP:trevalien@...]
> > Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:09 PM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> >
> > From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
> >
> > I think a good feature for the EQ expantion would be an ICQ option. Make
>a
> >
> > window that comes up like the icq window and let us send/recive mesages.
>I
> >
> > would love to be able to ues icq in EQ!
> >
> > Trevalien
> > Thinking of the Air Plane
> >
> >
> > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > >To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > >Date: Mon, 23 Aug 1999 14:02:32 -0500
> > >
> > >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > >
> > >Ya know, one thing I'd like to be able to ALT-TAB outta windows for is
>to
> >
> > >do
> > >OTHER THINGS - Not cheat. Cheating blows the game for me. No challenge.
> > >It's
> > >fun for a bit, but it's REALLY decreases the amount of time I'll play
>the
> > >game.
> > >
> > >I would LOVE to be able to check ICQ, browse the web, and check my
>email
> > >while I'm playing though. UO was good for that atleast!
> > >
> > >-Leod
> > >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Macabre [mailto:byakhee@...]
> > >Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 6:23 PM
> > >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > >
> > >
> > >From: "Macabre" <byakhee@...>
> > >
> > >Sorry, but your "hope something comes of this" when you found you could
> > >ALT - TAB out of the game and hope someone could write a cheat program
> > says
> > >it all. If you played it straight on Diablo and had a good time, why
> > would
> > >you want people to write a cheat program to exploit EverQuest. That
>just
> > >doesn't make any sense to me. UNLESS you are the kind of person that
> > needs
> > >to cheat to have fun. If you're not, I apologize, but then I just don't
> > >understand why you would sent that email.
> > >
> > >Macabre
> > >----- Original Message -----
> > >From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
> > >To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > >Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 9:08 AM
> > >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
> > >
> > >
> > > > From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
> > > >
> > > > I did not say that I had to cheat to have fun with EQ. I have lots
>of
> >
> > >fun
> > > > and haven't taken advantage of any of the "cheats" that this list
>has
> > > > provided. I use the guest info, but I don't trap monsters or
> > anything.
> > > > From Diablo I was one of the ppl that made it to level 50 with no
> > >cheats,
> > > > and only items that I found so I knew they were legit. I also had a
> > > > hacked-to-heck character on Diablo b/c sometimes I think it's fun to
> > run
> > > > around and kill anything ya darn well please.
> > > >
> > > > if I had to cheat to have fun I wouldn't play EQ.
> > > >
> > > > Omeg
> > > >
> > > > please note lack of flames.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > >It's players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother
>playing
> > >this
> > > > >game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone
> > else's
> > > > >game.
> > > > >
> > > > >Macabre
